name: tawk/tawk-drupal
description: tawk.to Live Chat module for Drupal 7 CMS

scripts.package: composer run clean && mkdir -p ./tmp/tawkto && cp -r ./css ./tmp/tawkto && cp -r ./includes ./tmp/tawkto && cp -r ./js ./tmp/tawkto && cp -r ./vendor ./tmp/tawkto && cp ./tawk_to.* ./tmp/tawkto && cp README.md ./tmp/tawkto && (cd ./tmp && zip -9 -rq ./tawkto.zip ./tawkto)
